languages.text: Поручение Лорд-капитана было выполнено незамедлительно — все дефективные единицы были сожжены в плавильнях, а их останки выброшены в открытый космос. Получив в распоряжение новых сервиторов, члены экипажа быстро забыли о странностях уничтоженных единиц, но в моей памяти этот инцидент сохранился навсегда.

traits.locale_text: Поручение Лорд-капитана было выполнено незамедлительно — все дефективные единицы были сожжены в плавильнях, а их останки выброшены в открытый космос. Получив в распоряжение новых сервиторов, члены экипажа быстро забыли о странностях уничтоженных единиц, но в моей памяти этот инцидент сохранился навсегда.

languages.text: The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.
languages.original_text: Поручение Лорд-капитана было выполнено незамедлительно — все дефективные единицы были сожжены в плавильнях, а их останки выброшены в открытый космос. Получив в распоряжение новых сервиторов, члены экипажа быстро забыли о странностях уничтоженных единиц, но в моей памяти этот инцидент сохранился навсегда.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの命令は迅速に実行された。すべての不良ユニットは炉で焼却され、その遺骸は宇宙に放出された。乗組員には代替のサーヴィターが提供され、破壊されたユニットの奇妙な特性はすぐに忘れ去られた。しかし、この事件は今日まで私の記憶を悩ませることとなった。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの命令は迅速に実行された。すべての不良ユニットは炉で焼却され、その遺骸は宇宙に放出された。乗組員には代替のサーヴィターが提供され、破壊されたユニットの奇妙な特性はすぐに忘れ去られた。しかし、この事件は今日まで私の記憶を悩ませることとなった。

languages.text: L'ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} fut exécuté sur-le-champ : toutes les unités défectueuses furent incinérées dans des fourneaux et leurs restes, expulsés dans l'espace. L'équipage reçut des servitors de remplacement et oublia très vite les bizarreries des unités détruites. Pour ma part, cependant, cet incident hante aujourd'hui encore mes souvenirs.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

traits.locale_text: L'ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} fut exécuté sur-le-champ : toutes les unités défectueuses furent incinérées dans des fourneaux et leurs restes, expulsés dans l'espace. L'équipage reçut des servitors de remplacement et oublia très vite les bizarreries des unités détruites. Pour ma part, cependant, cet incident hante aujourd'hui encore mes souvenirs.

languages.text: 舰长大人的命令得到了迅速执行，所有有缺陷的机仆都在熔炉中焚毁，烧剩下的残渣被丢到了虚空之中。新的机仆替换掉了原有的机仆，那些出现古怪故障的机仆也很快就被人遗忘了。然而，这件事情至今仍萦绕在我的记忆中。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人的命令得到了迅速执行，所有有缺陷的奴工都在熔炉中焚毁，烧剩下的残渣被丢到了虚空之中。新的奴工替换掉了原有的奴工，那些出现古怪故障的奴工也很快就被人遗忘了。然而，这件事情至今仍萦绕在我的记忆中。

languages.text: La orden de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán se ejecutó de inmediato: todas las unidades defectuosas se incineraron en los hornos y sus restos se arrojaron al vacío. La tripulación recibió servidores de reemplazo y no tardó en olvidar las peculiaridades de las unidades destruidas... pero mi mente siempre vuelve a este incidente.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

traits.locale_text: La orden de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán se ejecutó de inmediato: todas las unidades defectuosas se incineraron en los hornos y sus restos se arrojaron al vacío. La tripulación recibió servidores de reemplazo y no tardó en olvidar las peculiaridades de las unidades destruidas... pero mi mente siempre vuelve a este incidente.

languages.text: Der Befehl des Lord Captains wurde unverzüglich ausgeführt. Alle defekten Einheiten wurden in Öfen eingeäschert und ihre Überreste in die Leere gestoßen. Der Crew wurden Ersatzservitoren zur Verfügung gestellt und bald vergaßen alle das merkwürdige Verhalten der zerstörten Einheiten. Mich aber plagt noch heute die Erinnerung an diesen Vorfall.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

traits.locale_text: Der Befehl des Lord Captains wurde unverzüglich ausgeführt. Alle defekten Einheiten wurden in Öfen eingeäschert und ihre Überreste in die Leere gestoßen. Der Crew wurden Ersatzservitoren zur Verfügung gestellt und bald vergaßen alle das merkwürdige Verhalten der zerstörten Einheiten. Mich aber plagt noch heute die Erinnerung an diesen Vorfall.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın emri derhâl yerine getirildi: Defolu birimlerin tamamı fırınlarda yakılmak suretiyle yok edildi, fırından çıkarılan kalıntılarıysa uçsuza atıldı. Mürettebata yeni hizmetörler teslim edilip yok edilen birimlerin tuhaflıkları unutulup gitse de bu hadiseye dair anılarım, hâlen beni huzursuz ediyor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's command was executed post-haste: all defective units were incinerated in furnaces, and their remains were expelled into the void. The crew was provided with replacement servitors and soon forgot all about the destroyed units' peculiarities, yet this incident haunts my memories to this day.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın emri derhâl yerine getirildi: Defolu birimlerin tamamı fırınlarda yakılmak suretiyle yok edildi ve kalan kısımları uçsuza atıldı. Mürettebata yeni hizmetörler teslim edildikten sonra yok edilen birimlerin tuhaflıkları unutulup gitse de bu hadiseden kalan anılar hâlen beni rahat bırakmış değil.
